attributes.action: Allow any petition to be valid on the number ten web-site.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This web site rejects petitions on a regular basis due to their content. Petitioning is highly democratic as it is effectively the collecting of votes.
Every body has the right to be heard so I petition that no petition can be refused to be displayed on this web-site. 

(Unless it promotes hate or has no point about government policy.)

rejection.details: We have strict guidelines on petitions and have an agreed policy on which ones we allow
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
